files.patch:
@@ -1159,4 +1159,2 @@
-    if (vill == 1) {                                         \
-      guarantee((vlmul | vsew | vta | vma) == 0,             \
-                "the other bits in vtype shall be zero");    \

+    /* If vill then other bits of vtype must be zero. */     \
+    guarantee(!vill, "vill not supported");                  \
